title: Welcome to Runinhas! ðŸŽ®
subtitle: Your timing assistant for Dota 2
description: To get started, you need to install Dota 2's GSI (Game State Integration).

what_is_gsi.title: What is GSI?
what_is_gsi.description: Game State Integration allows Runinhas to receive real-time information from your game, such as match time, runes, and important events.

how_it_works.title: How does it work?
how_it_works.step1: Click the button below to install
how_it_works.step2: A configuration file is created in your Dota 2 folder
how_it_works.step3: Restart Dota 2 if it's currently open

is_safe.title: Is it safe?
is_safe.description: Yes! GSI is an official Valve feature. We only read game information, we never modify anything. You can check the configuration file after installation.
